translation.en: "Childhood is not from birth to a certain age."
translation.fr: L'enfance n'est pas l'époque qui va jusqu'à un certain âge.

translation.en: "And at a certain age, the child is grown and puts away childish things."
translation.fr: Et, à cet âge certain, l'enfant abandonne ses occupations infantiles.

translation.en: "Childhood is the kingdom where nobody dies."
translation.fr: L'enfance est le royaume où personne ne meurt.

translation.en: You just have to break them in.
I've been breaking them in. For three days.
Can l just go barefoot? No, absolutely not.
translation.fr: - Si j'y allais pieds nus ? - Pas question.

translation.en: Just thinking it's a little much, you know? The dress and the shoes...
translation.fr: Je trouve ça un peu trop. La robe, les chaussures...

translation.en: Where do you want them, boss?
On either side of the aisle.
- What aisle? - Does no one have vision?
translation.fr: Quelle allée ? Personne n'a de sixième sens ?

translation.en: You, go home and get lots of beauty sleep.
translation.fr: Toi, rentre faire un sommeil réparateur.

translation.en: l was just checking for cold feet.
It's not too late to change your mind.
What? Now you're having second thoughts?
No, I've been waiting a century to marry you, Miss Swan.
translation.fr: J'attends ce mariage depuis un siècle.

translation.en: l haven't told you everything about myself.
translation.fr: Je ne t'ai pas tout dit sur moi.

translation.en: Look, you can't scare me away now.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux plus me faire fuir.

translation.en: Look, a few years after Carlisle created me...
translation.fr: Quelques années après que Carlisle m'a créé,
je me suis rebellé contre lui.

translation.en: l resented him for curbing my appetite.
And so for a while, l went off on my own.
translation.fr: Je suis parti seul, un moment.

translation.en: l wanted to know how it felt to hunt.
translation.fr: Pour ressentir l'excitation de la chasse.

translation.en: You probably saved more lives than you took.
translation.fr: Tu as sauvé plus de vies.

translation.en: Bella, that's what l told myself.
But they were all human beings.
l looked into their eyes as they died and l saw who l was...
translation.fr: Dans leurs yeux de mourants, j'ai vu qui j'étais.

translation.en: And what I'll be capable of.
translation.fr: Et ce dont je serai capable.

translation.en: Why are you telling me this tonight?
translation.fr: Pourquoi me dire ça, ce soir ?

translation.en: Did you really think this was going to change my mind about you?
translation.fr: Tu croyais que je te verrais autrement ?

translation.en: l just wondered if it would change your mind about yourself...
translation.fr: C'est toi que tu pourrais voir autrement.

translation.en: ...and who you want to see when you look in the mirror a year from now.
translation.fr: Et ton reflet dans le miroir, dans un an.

translation.en: l know l can do this.
You should give yourself some credit for that.
Now, hopefully, a year from now...
...I am going to look in the mirror and see someone like you.
translation.fr: mon miroir reflétera quelqu'un comme toi.

translation.en: l mean, someone capable of courage and sacrifice and love.
translation.fr: Capable de courage, de sacrifice... et d'amour.

translation.en: - Come on! Let's go! - I am late for my bachelor party.
translation.fr: Allez, viens ! L'enterrement de ma vie de garçon.

translation.en: Send him out, Bella, or we're coming in after him.
translation.fr: Lâche-le, Bella, ou on vient le chercher.

translation.en: No, just a couple of mountain lions. Maybe a few bears.
translation.fr: Rien qu'un ou deux pumas. Et quelques ours.

translation.en: Don't worry, Bella, we'll give him back in plenty of time.
translation.fr: On te le renverra à temps.

translation.en: Ok, go, before they break my house.
translation.fr: File, avant qu'ils détruisent ma maison.

translation.en: I'll meet you at the altar.
I'll be the one in white.
translation.fr: Je serai la fille en blanc.

translation.en: What did l say about beauty sleep?
Please. I am not offended by your choice of groom.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas offusquée de ton choix

translation.en: Just my blatant lack of respect for mortality.
translation.fr: Seulement par mon mépris de la vie humaine.
Les mariages. Tout le monde s'y réconcilie.

translation.en: Hey, so, did you find our daughter?
You sure? l don't want to...
translation.fr: Tu es sûre ? Je ne voudrais pas...
Je sais, je suis à tomber.

translation.en: We thought you needed something blue.
- lt was Grandmother Swan's. - But we added the sapphires.
translation.fr: - C'était à grand-mère Swan. - On a ajouté les saphirs.

translation.en: Pass on to your daughter, and her daughter.
translation.fr: Tu le légueras à ta fille. Et elle, à la sienne.

translation.en: Do you want to see it? l want to see it!
They have got to be related.
So, you think Bella's going to be showing?
translation.fr: Tu crois que Bella a pris du ventre ?

translation.en: Ok. Who else gets married at 18?
translation.fr: Qui d'autre se marie à 18 ans ?

translation.en: Just don't let me fall, Dad.
Ladies and gentlemen, we are gathered here on this glorious day...
translation.fr: Mes amis, nous sommes réunis en ce jour glorieux

translation.en: ...to witness the union of Edward Cullen and Bella Swan.
translation.fr: pour célébrer l'union d'Edward Cullen et de Bella Swan.

translation.en: -Take you, Bella Swan. -To have and to hold.

translation.fr: Pour le meilleur ou le pire...

translation.en: As long as we both shall live.
We were just saying how pretty everything is, you know, just saying.
translation.fr: On se disait que tout est très joli.

translation.en: Well, thanks so much. You don't think it's too much?
translation.fr: Merci. On n'en a pas fait trop ?

translation.en: - I am happy for you. - Thank you.
l hope you'll be happy, Bella.
Have you heard from him? I am sure Jake wishes you the best.
translation.fr: - Des nouvelles de lui ? - Jake est sûrement heureux pour toi.

translation.en: Well, l plan on getting drunk.
They're serving up some pretty fancy champagne.
Sue, can l get you a glass?
Yes, and these are our cousins from Alaska.
translation.fr: Et nos cousines d'Alaska : Tanya, Kate.

translation.en: - Tanya, Kate. - We've heard so much about you.
translation.fr: On nous a tant parlé de toi.

translation.en: - l can't do this. - You promised.
translation.fr: - Je ne peux pas. - Tu as promis.

translation.en: He wanted to be like us.
To live in peace with humans.
translation.fr: Vivre en paix avec les humains.

translation.en: Let's not monopolize the bride. Congratulations.
Well, what's a wedding without some family drama?
translation.fr: Pas de mariage sans drame familial.

translation.en: Umm, I'd like to propose a toast.
Bella, I hope you've gotten enough sleep these last 18 years.
translation.fr: Bella, j'espère que tu as assez dormi, en 18 ans.

translation.en: Because you won't be getting any more for a while.
translation.fr: Tu ne dormiras plus de sitôt !

translation.en: Well, Bella was just like everybody else, totally mesmerized by Edward.
translation.fr: Bella était... comme tout le monde, fascinée par Edward.

translation.en: Or "The Hair," as l call him.

translation.fr: il n'y a plus que Bella.

translation.en: Even though she's not the captain of the volleyball team.
translation.fr: Elle n'est même pas capitaine de l'équipe de volley.

translation.en: I am just kidding. I am just kidding.
Or the president of the student council.
translation.fr: Ou présidente du conseil de classe.

translation.en: Edward will be a good husband.
I know this because I am a cop.
translation.fr: Je le sais, parce que... je suis flic.

translation.en: Like how to hunt somebody to the ends of the Earth.
translation.fr: Je sais... traquer quelqu'un au bout du monde.

translation.en: ...you'll have to get over your aversion to fashion.
And I know how to use a gun.
translation.fr: Je sais me servir d'une arme.

translation.en: I'd like to thank Renne and Charlie...
...for bringing such a wonderful person into the world and into our lives.
translation.fr: d'avoir mis cet ange au monde, et dans notre vie.

translation.en: We will cherish and protect her forever.
translation.fr: Nous veillerons sur elle à jamais.

translation.en: ...to meet someone who you can bare your soul to.
translation.fr: d'avoir quelqu'un à qui dévoiler son âme.

translation.en: And who will accept you for what you are.
I've been waiting, what seems like a very long time...
...I feel like I can finally begin.
So I'd like to propose a toast to my beautiful bride.
translation.fr: J'aimerais porter un toast à ma merveilleuse épouse.

translation.en: No measure of time with you will be long enough.
translation.fr: Jamais le temps, à tes côtés, ne sera assez long.

translation.en: Another one of your gifts just arrived.
What's a wedding present doing out here?
The best man didn't have time to get a tux.
translation.fr: Le témoin n'a pas eu le temps de louer un smoking.

translation.en: I'll see if Rosalie wants to dance.
translation.fr: Je vais inviter Rosalie à danser.

translation.en: I am sorry I am late.
We were going to put your face on a milk carton.
translation.fr: On allait lancer un avis de recherche.

translation.en: It's weird to be back on two legs again, in clothes.
translation.fr: Bizarre de marcher de nouveau sur deux jambes. Avec des habits.

translation.en: Gotten out of practice with the whole human thing.
translation.fr: J'ai perdu la pratique des choses humaines.

translation.en: Why? Afraid I'll trash your party?
translation.fr: Tu as peur que je gâche ta fête ?

translation.en: You'd think I'd be used to telling you goodbye by now.
translation.fr: Je devrais être habitué à te dire au revoir.

translation.en: Come on, you're not supposed to be the one crying, Bella.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas toi qui es censée pleurer.

translation.en: This is how I am going to remember you.
translation.fr: Voilà comment je me souviendrai de toi.

translation.en: Because what, soon I am going to be dead to you?
translation.fr: Je serai bientôt morte, pour toi ?

translation.en: I am just trying to appreciate your last night as a human.
translation.fr: Je profite de ta dernière nuit humaine.

translation.en: Well, it's not my last night.
l didn't really want to spend my honeymoon writhing in pain.
translation.fr: Pas question d'agoniser en pleine lune de miel.

translation.en: It's not like you're goin to have a real honeymoon with him, anyway.
translation.fr: T'auras pas une vraie lune de miel, avec lui.

translation.en: It's going to be as real as anyone else's.
You can't be serious, Bella. Tell me you're not that stupid.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas sérieuse, ni aussi stupide.

translation.en: l mean, it's really none of your business.
- No! You can't do this! - Jake.
- Listen to me, Bella. - Jake, let me go!
Are you out of your mind? Huh? You'll kill her!
translation.fr: Tu es fou ? Tu vas la tuer !

translation.en: You're not going to start something that we'll have to finish.
I am really, really, really stupid.
Come on, people are probably missing us. Let's go back.
translation.fr: Ils vont remarquer notre absence. Allons-y.

translation.en: So, he really won't tell you where he's taking you?
translation.fr: Il ne veut pas te dire où il t'emmène ?

translation.en: Everything's packed and ready to go.
- I am going to see him. - Yeah.

translation.fr: Que tu ne vives plus sous mon toit.

translation.en: It's going to be strange for me, too.
You know it will always be your home, right?
l always have and l always will.
You don't want to miss your plane.
So, we're not staying in Rio?
translation.fr: On ne reste pas à Rio ?

translation.en: lt was a gift from Carlisle.
l am nothing if not traditional.
You want to take a look around?
Do you want to go for a swim?
l could use a few human minutes.
Don't take too long, Mrs. Cullen.
Bella, l can't tell you how sorry l am.
Really, I am not. I am fine.
Why can't you see how perfectly happy l am?
l mean, now I am sort of pissed off, actually.
You should be angry with me.
l mean, we knew this was going to be tricky, right?
translation.fr: On savait que ce serait risqué.

translation.en: l mean, it was amazing for me.

translation.fr: Que je n'aie pas eu de plaisir ?

translation.en: l know it's not the same for you...
...but for a human, l can't imagine that it gets any better than that.
translation.fr: une humaine... ne peut rêver mieux.

translation.en: ...was the best night of my existence.
translation.fr: fut la plus belle de mon existence.

translation.en: You're not going to touch me again, are you?
You know that's not what l mean.
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas de ça.

translation.en: lt was a really good dream.
Because l wanted it to be real.
translation.fr: Parce que j'aimerais qu'il soit vrai.

translation.en: Maybe they'll say she was in a car crash.
translation.fr: Ils diront qu'elle s'est tuée en voiture.

translation.en: Or tripped and fell off a cliff.
At least I'll get one thing out of it.
translation.fr: Ça me donnera au moins un prétexte.

translation.en: Cullens are not a danger to the town or the tribe.
translation.fr: Les Cullen ne menacent ni la ville ni la tribu.

translation.en: Well, he's either going to kill her or change her.
translation.fr: Il la tuera ou la transformera. Le traité décide...

translation.en: - And the treaty says-- - l say, Jacob.
translation.fr: Il la tuera ou la transformera. Le traité décide... Je décide.

translation.en: You know, if you wanted things different, you should've become alpha.
translation.fr: Si tu voulais agir, fallait devenir l'Alpha.

translation.en: Turning it down seemed like a good idea at the time.
translation.fr: Je pensais bien faire en refusant.

translation.en: Jake, you really think you could kill Bella if she comes back a vampire?
translation.fr: Tu pourrais tuer Bella si elle revenait en vampire ?

translation.en: No, make one of us do it, then hold a grudge against us.
translation.fr: Laisse un de nous le tuer et venge-toi.

translation.en: Would you just get over it? It's not like you've imprinted on her.
translation.fr: Alors, oublie. Tu ne t'es pas imprégné d'elle.

translation.en: Yeah, some people are just lucky, l guess.
None of them belong to themselves anymore.
And the sickest part is their genes tell them they're happy about it.
translation.fr: Pire, leurs gènes les persuadent de leur bonheur.

translation.en: Least if you imprinted on someone, you'd finally forget about Bella.
translation.fr: Si tu t'imprégnais, tu oublierais enfin Bella.

translation.en: l mean, being any kind of happy is better than being miserable...
translation.fr: Je veux dire... un bonheur imparfait vaut mieux qu'un amour impossible.
un bonheur imparfait vaut mieux qu'un amour impossible.

translation.en: Bella, these are our housekeepers, Gustavo and Kaure.
translation.fr: Ils vont faire le ménage. Gustavo... et Kaure.

translation.en: Well, l guess we just leave them to it.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'ils ont du travail.

translation.en: What was that all about? She's afraid for you.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce qu'elle a ? - Elle a peur pour toi.

translation.en: Because l have you here all alone.
translation.fr: Parce que je t'ai amenée ici, seule.

translation.en: You mean she knows about you?
She's native Ticuna. They have legends about blood-drinking demons...
translation.fr: C'est une Ticuna. Leurs légendes parlent de démons buveurs de sang
Leurs légendes parlent de démons buveurs de sang qui traquent les belles femmes.

translation.en: You don't need to see this.
lt must have been the chicken.
How many days has it been since the wedding?
translation.fr: Combien de jours, depuis le mariage ?

translation.en: Will you tell me what's going on?

translation.fr: - Tu as vu quoi ? - Je te passe Carlisle.

translation.en: - Here's Carlisle. - Bella, what's going on?
translation.fr: - Tu as vu quoi ? - Je te passe Carlisle. Qu'y a-t-il ?

translation.en: l don't know. I am a little worried. Can vampires go into shock?
translation.fr: Je m'inquiète un peu. Les vampires sont émotifs ?

translation.en: l know that it's impossible, but l think that I am pregnant.
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est impossible, mais je crois être enceinte.

translation.en: Carlisle, l swear, something just moved inside me.
translation.fr: Ça vient de bouger dans mon ventre.

translation.en: - ls this even possible? - I don't know.
translation.fr: - C'est possible ? - Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: The sooner Bella's here, the sooner we can find out what it is.
translation.fr: Plus vite elle reviendra, plus vite nous saurons.

translation.en: I need you to get to the mainland at once.
Kaure's making sure you're still alive.
translation.fr: Kaure s'assure que tu es vivante.

translation.en: What did you do with her?
What do you know about this?
l know that you are a demon!
translation.fr: Je sais que vous êtes un démon !

translation.en: Her people have legends. She might have seen this before.
translation.fr: Les légendes. Elle doit avoir déjà vu ça.

translation.en: Tell me how to help her.

translation.fr: Vous ne faites que le mal.

translation.en: Tell me how she can survive this.
I am not going to let it hurt you.
translation.fr: Je ne laisserai pas ça te tuer.

translation.en: Carlisle will get that thing out.
translation.fr: Carlisle te débarrassera de cette chose.

translation.en: - What's going on? - l need your help.
Hey, haven't seen you in a while.
- You ok? - So, you finally heard from Bella?
translation.fr: Ça va ? Des nouvelles de Bella ?

translation.en: They want to wait until she feels better before they travel.
translation.fr: Ils veulent attendre qu'elle aille mieux.

translation.en: Yeah, she told me not to worry, but she sounded...
translation.fr: Elle m'a rassuré, mais elle semblait...

translation.en: Listen, just give it to me straight.
-She's here? -They came home two weeks ago.
translation.fr: Elle est là ? Depuis deux semaines.
Pas plus près. Tu as un problème ?

translation.en: Yeah, it's nice to see you, too.
So, are you going to tell me what's wrong with you?
Rose, you want to help me up?
We didn't know it was even possible.
- What is it? - I am not sure.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - Je ne suis pas sûr.

translation.en: Ultrasounds and needles won't penetrate the embryonic sac.
translation.fr: Les ultrasons n'atteignent pas le sac embryonnaire.
Et je ne le vois pas.

translation.en: And l can't see Bella's future anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne vois plus son avenir.

translation.en: We've been researching legends, but there isn't much to go on.
translation.fr: On a étudié les légendes, sans résultat.

translation.en: What we do know is that it's strong.
translation.fr: Mais on sait qu'il est fort

translation.en: Why haven't you done anything? Take it out of her!
translation.fr: Pourquoi vous ne l'avez pas enlevé ?

translation.en: This is none of your business, dog.
All this fighting isn't good for Bella.
The fetus isn't good for Bella.
Say the word, Alice. "Baby." It's just a little baby.
translation.fr: Nomme-le, Alice. Le bébé. Ce n'est qu'un bébé.

translation.en: Carlisle, you've got to do something.
It's not his decision. It's not any of yours.
translation.fr: Ce n'est ni à lui, ni à vous de décider.

translation.en: Jacob, l need to talk to you.
l always knew you'd destroy her.
translation.fr: Je savais que tu la détruirais.

translation.en: She thinks Carlisle can turn her at the last minute...
translation.fr: Elle croit que Carlisle la transformera à temps.

translation.en: ...like he did for me and Esme.

translation.fr: Il peut ? Les probabilités sont... ... minces.

translation.en: Look, Jacob, l need you to do something for me.
You have a connection with her that I'll never understand.
translation.fr: Ton lien avec elle est un mystère pour moi.

translation.en: Maybe you could talk to her, change her mind.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais lui parler. La faire changer d'avis.
tu auras ce que tu voulais.

translation.en: - So, Edward sent you in here to talk to me? - Sort of.
translation.fr: - Edward t'a envoyé me parler ? - En gros.

translation.en: Though l can't figure out why he thinks you'd listen to me.
translation.fr: Curieusement, il croit que tu m'écouteras.

translation.en: l mean, you never have before.
Since when are you and blondie BFFs?
translation.fr: Depuis quand la blonde est ton amie ?

translation.en: l know this seems like a scary thing...
It's like this miracle or something.
So, it's a bouncing baby boy.
I am sorry l didn't know. Should've brought some blue balloons.
translation.fr: Si j'avais su, j'aurais apporté des ballons bleus.

translation.en: When l picture him, l see a boy.
translation.fr: Je le vois comme un garçon.

translation.en: - I am strong enough. - Come on.
translation.fr: Je suis assez forte. Je t'en prie.

translation.en: You can spout that crap to your bloodsucker, but you don't fool me.
translation.fr: Garde ce baratin pour ton buveur de sang.

translation.en: l can see what that thing's doing to you. It's a killer, Bella.
translation.fr: Je vois ce que te fait cette chose. C'est un tueur.

translation.en: - You're wrong. - And when you die...
translation.fr: Tu te trompes. Quand tu mourras...

translation.en: ...what was the point? Of me loving you, you loving him.
translation.fr: à quoi aura servi... mon amour pour toi, ton amour pour lui ?

translation.en: How is that right for anyone?
Because l sure don't see it.
Jake, everything's going to be ok.
And I am not sticking around to watch.
translation.fr: Je ne tiens pas à y assister.

translation.en: Jacob! Jake, I can do this. I can do this.
Don't do this. I am strong enough. I am strong enough.
translation.fr: - Ne fais pas ça. - Je suis assez forte.

translation.en: This is none of your business, dog.
The fetus isn't good for Bella.
Don't you even care that it's killing you?
translation.fr: Tu t'en fiches si ça te tue ?

translation.en: - Is it true, Jacob? - What will it be?

translation.fr: - Ça grandit vite. - C'est contre nature.
- Ça grandit vite. - C'est contre nature. - Dangereux. - Monstrueux.

translation.en: - Monstrosity. - An abomination. On our land.
- We can't allow it. - We can't allow it.
We have to protect the tribe.
What they've bred won't be able to control its thirst.
translation.fr: Ce qu'ils ont engendré ne pourra pas contrôler sa soif.

translation.en: Every human will be in danger.
translation.fr: Tous les humains seront en danger.

translation.en: - We're ready. - No time to waste.
translation.fr: On est prêts. Le temps presse.

translation.en: We must destroy it before it's born.
translation.fr: Il faut le détruire avant terme.

translation.en: Bella's human. Our protection applies to her.
translation.fr: Bella est humaine. On doit la protéger.

translation.en: We have real enemies to fight tonight.
translation.fr: Nous combattrons de vrais ennemis, ce soir.

translation.en: You will fight with us, Jake.
translation.fr: Tu te battras à nos côtés.

translation.en: I am the grandson of Ephraim Black.
translation.fr: Je suis le petit-fils d'Ephraïm Black.

translation.en: I am the grandson of a chief!
I wasn't born to follow you, or anyone else.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas né pour t'obéir, ni à quiconque !

translation.en: Don't worry. They're not following us.
translation.fr: T'en fais pas. - Ils nous suivent pas. - Qu'est-ce que tu fais ici ?

translation.en: What do you think you're doing here?
translation.fr: - Ils nous suivent pas. - Qu'est-ce que tu fais ici ?

translation.en: - l left Sam's pack. - Go home, Seth.
translation.fr: - J'ai quitté la meute. - Rentre, Seth.

translation.en: - l won't stand behind him. - Oh, yes, you will.
translation.fr: - Je ne lui obéirai pas. - Oh que si !

translation.en: I am not kidding. Get out of here.
ls that an order? Going to make me bow down, too?
translation.fr: C'est un ordre ? Tu veux me soumettre aussi ?

translation.en: Look, I am just going off on my own here, ok?
Great, and I've got your back.

translation.fr: Si Sam s'attaque à Bella, tu es prêt à combattre

translation.en: ...are you really ready to fight your own brothers?
translation.fr: Si Sam s'attaque à Bella, tu es prêt à combattre tes propres frères ?

translation.en: If it's the right thing to do.
I am going to go give the Cullens a heads-up.
How cool is this? Two-man pack. Two against the world.
translation.fr: Cool ! Une meute à deux. Deux contre tous.

translation.en: You're getting on my nerves, Seth.
They're not going to touch her.
Man, l can smell them from all the way out here.
What the hell are you doing here?
I am not going to let my little brother get himself killed.
translation.fr: Je viens protéger mon petit frère.

translation.en: Go away, Leah! l can take care of myself.
translation.fr: Lâche-moi. Je sais ce que je fais.

translation.en: That you think so proves you need a babysitter.
translation.fr: Ça prouve qu'il te faut une babysitter.

translation.en: Ok, would the both of you shut up?
Sam doesn't even know l left.
translation.fr: Il ignore que je suis partie.

translation.en: l think he just figured it out.
l know what his plan is.
Sam's lost the element of surprise...
translation.fr: Sam a perdu l'élément de surprise

translation.en: ...and he doesn't want to take you on outnumbered...
...so he's not going to come at you head on.
He's got the place surrounded and he'll wait for his opportunity.
translation.fr: Il a cerné la maison et attend le bon moment.

translation.en: We won't get through without a fight.
No fights. We won't be the ones to break the treaty.
translation.fr: Non. Nous ne violerons pas le traité.

translation.en: The treaty is void, at least in Sam's mind.
translation.fr: Il n'a plus de valeur. Aux yeux de Sam.

translation.en: Carlisle, no one's hunted for weeks.
You've done us a great service, Jacob.
l know they're out there somewhere, but l can't hear them anymore.
translation.fr: Je sais qu'ils sont là. Mais je ne les entends plus.

translation.en: l stopped hearing them, too, the second l decided to leave.
translation.fr: J'ai cessé de les entendre dès mon départ.

translation.en: You know you can't stay here.
- But l don't have any place... - l can't trust you with the Cullens.
translation.fr: Tu es dangereuse pour les Cullen.

translation.en: l just have to follow you.
Look, Seth doesn't want you here. Neither do l.
translation.fr: Seth ne veut pas de toi. Moi non plus.

translation.en: Being unwanted isn't exactly a new thing for me.
Look, I'll stay out of your way. I'll do whatever you want...
translation.fr: Je ne serai pas dans tes pattes. Je ferai tout.

translation.en: ...except go back to Sam's pack and be the pathetic ex-girlfriend he can't get away from.
translation.fr: Sauf revenir vers Sam et m'accrocher comme une ex minable.

translation.en: You don't know how many times l wished l could imprint on someone.
translation.fr: Si tu savais comme j'ai voulu m'imprégner d'un autre.

translation.en: I am going to do a perimeter run. You got my flank?
But there are no splinters. You haven't punctured anything.
It's crushing you from the inside out.
Carlisle, tell her what you told me. Tell her.
translation.fr: Dis-lui ce que tu m'as dit. Dis-lui.

translation.en: Carlisle, tell me. It's all right.
The fetus isn't compatible with your body.
translation.fr: Le fœtus est incompatible avec ton corps.

translation.en: lt won't allow you to get the nutrition you need.
It's starving you by the hour. l can't stop it, and l can't slow it down.
translation.fr: Il te fait dépérir. Je ne peux rien y changer.

translation.en: At this rate, your heart will give out before you can deliver.
translation.fr: Ton cœur cessera de battre avant terme.

translation.en: Then I'll hold on as long as l can, and then...
There are some conditions that even venom can't overcome.
translation.fr: Il y a des cas où le venin est inopérant.
Je ne peux vivre sans toi.

translation.en: You won't. You're going to have a part of me.
translation.fr: Il te restera une part de moi.

translation.en: Do you honestly think that l could love it or even tolerate it if it killed you?
translation.fr: Tu crois que je pourrais l'aimer ou même le tolérer, s'il te tuait ?

translation.en: You have to accept what is.
translation.fr: Tu dois accepter ce qui est.

translation.en: Because you've given me no choice!
translation.fr: Tu ne m'as pas laissé le choix !

translation.en: Bella, we're supposed to be partners, remember?
But you decided this on your own. You've decided to leave me.
translation.fr: Mais tu as décidé seule. Décidé de m'abandonner.
Ne le prends pas comme ça.

translation.en: Well, l have no other way to see it.
Because it's me who'll lose you.
Smile like I am your favorite person in the world.
translation.fr: Me sourire comme si j'étais ton préféré.

translation.en: Feels complete when you're here, Jake.
translation.fr: C'est parfait, quand tu es là.

translation.en: We need to find a way to get some food into her system.
- If l could only see the fetus... - The baby.
translation.fr: - Si je pouvais voir le fœtus... - Le bébé.

translation.en: ...maybe l could figure out what it wants.
lt wasn't an idea. lt was a snide comment.
translation.fr: Pas une idée. Un commentaire sarcastique.

translation.en: That it's probably just looking for someone to sink its teeth into.
translation.fr: Qu'il a envie de mordre quelqu'un.

translation.en: If it's craving, it's not going to want animal blood.
translation.fr: Il ne voudra pas de sang animal.

translation.en: l have some O negative laid aside for Bella.
translation.fr: J'ai mis de côté du O négatif.

translation.en: You're going to make her drink that?
It's the fastest way to test the theory.
Only if you're comfortable with it.
l think I am going to be sick.
This might make it a little easier to take.
translation.fr: Ce sera plus facile à avaler.

translation.en: Your pulse is already getting stronger.
- Well, you sound better. l am.
translation.fr: - Tu as l'air d'aller mieux. - Oui.

translation.en: This whole thing must've put a kink in the honeymoon, huh?
translation.fr: Tout ça a dû gâcher ta lune de miel.

translation.en: Otherwise, married life treating you ok?
translation.fr: À part ça, la vie conjugale ? Edward est toujours ton dieu ?

translation.en: Edward still walks on water and all that?
translation.fr: la vie conjugale ? Edward est toujours ton dieu ?

translation.en: Yeah, but, l mean, it is different now.
The important thing is that you're better.
translation.fr: Du moment que tu vas mieux.

translation.en: And that you're coming home soon, right?
Ok, Dad, l don't want you to freak out...
...but I am going to a medical center in Switzerland.
translation.fr: je vais dans une clinique, en Suisse.

translation.en: What? No, no, you're not. You're not going to Switzerland. What are you... You said you were better.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Non, pas en Suisse. Tu as dit que tu allais mieux.

translation.en: No, Bella. I am getting on a plane. No.
It's really more of a spa.
And I am sure that I'd be better by the time you got there anyway.
translation.fr: Je serais sûrement... rétablie avant ton arrivée.

translation.en: ...like I am sitting on the couch with you, eating pizza or something.
translation.fr: Sur le canapé, avec toi et une pizza.

translation.en: Dad, l got to go, ok?
I am sorry I've been so angry.
I've left you alone in this.
Well, they say the first year is the hardest.
translation.fr: La 1ère année est la plus dure.

translation.en: He likes the sound of your voice.
translation.fr: Il aime le son de ta voix.

translation.en: He likes my voice as well.
l thought he was like me, but he's not. He's like you.
translation.fr: Je le croyais comme moi, mais il est comme toi.

translation.en: Of course you're happy. How could you not be?
So, that's the last of it?
Bella could deliver as early as tomorrow. If she's going to have any chance at all, she'll need more blood.
translation.fr: Bella pourrait accoucher demain. Il lui faut plus de sang.

translation.en: You have to be at your strongest for her. We need to go tonight.
translation.fr: prendre des forces. On va partir ce soir.

translation.en: Sam won't hesitate. You will be slaughtered.
translation.fr: Sam n'hésitera pas à vous massacrer.

translation.en: - That won't be enough. - We have no choice, Jacob.
translation.fr: - Ça ne suffira pas. - Pas le choix.

translation.en: If there's anything we can do to save her, we have to try.
translation.fr: Il faut tout tenter pour la sauver.

translation.en: - You'd risk your lives for her? - Of course we would.
translation.fr: - Au péril de votre vie ? - Bien sûr.

translation.en: Bella's a part of our family now.
translation.fr: Bella est de la famille, désormais.

translation.en: As strong as the one l was born into.
translation.fr: Aussi unie que la mienne l'était.

translation.en: l know what l have to do.
We should phase, Jacob. We can't protect ourselves like this.
translation.fr: Nous devons muter. Nous sommes trop vulnérables.

translation.en: They'll see it as a threat.
Be easier if l could hear you, too.
- How's the new family working out? - You done?
translation.fr: Ça va, ta nouvelle famille ? C'est tout ?

translation.en: l want Sam to take back Leah and Seth.
translation.fr: Que Sam reprenne Leah et Seth.

translation.en: l need Sam to wait until Bella's been separated from the problem.
translation.fr: Sam doit attendre que Bella soit délivrée du problème.

translation.en: Tell Sam that when the moment comes, I'll be the one to destroy it.
translation.fr: Dis à Sam que le moment venu, j'anéantirai la chose.

translation.en: I am the only one who can.
Can't we come up with something just a little more classic?
translation.fr: On ne pourrait rien trouver d'un peu plus "classique" ?

translation.en: Yeah, it's not like I am the one carrying a demon.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas moi qui porte un démon.

translation.en: Why don't you tell Jacob what you've decided?
translation.fr: Dis-lui ce que tu as décidé.

translation.en: Rose is trying to talk Bella out of her baby names.
translation.fr: Rose critique les choix de prénoms de Bella.

translation.en: Well, then I am on your side no matter what you picked.
Ok, fine, that one's not awful.
translation.fr: Bon, ce n'est pas le pire.

translation.en: Why don't you tell him the girl's name?
l was playing around with our moms' names.
translation.fr: J'ai pensé au prénom de nos mères.

translation.en: And it's unique, which certainly fits the situation.
translation.fr: Et unique. Adapté à la situation.

translation.en: Carlisle said the placenta must have detached.
translation.fr: D'après Carlisle, le placenta s'est détaché.

translation.en: - He's coming as fast as he can, but... - We'll have to do it.
translation.fr: - Il revient dès que possible. - On ne peut pas attendre.

translation.en: Rose! Let the morphine spread. There's no time. He's dying.
translation.fr: - Attends que la morphine agisse. - Pas le temps, il va mourir.

translation.en: Alice, get her out of here!
Save her! You've got to change her!
l can't, not whilst he's still in there. l got to get him out first.
translation.fr: Pas tant qu'il est en elle. Je dois le sortir avant.

translation.en: Stay, Bella. Stay focused. Keep your heart beating.
translation.fr: Accroche-toi. Concentre-toi. Fais battre ton cœur.

translation.en: l promise I am ok. Let me.
You deserve to live with this.
translation.fr: Tu mérites une vie de remords.

translation.en: You're not dead. You're not dead.
No, it will work. lt will work.
Come back to me, please, baby.
l don't care what he's done.
translation.fr: Peu m'importe ce qu'il a fait.

translation.en: - He's still my son. - I am sorry, Billy.
translation.fr: Il reste mon fils. Navré, Billy.

translation.en: l just thought you should know.
Suddenly, it's not the Earth holding you here.
translation.fr: La Terre ne vous retient plus.

translation.en: You would do anything, be anything she needs.
translation.fr: Vous seriez prêt à tout pour être celui qu'il lui faut.

translation.en: You're going to be all right.

translation.fr: - On est moins nombreux. - Beaucoup moins.

translation.en: l won't let them hurt my family.
translation.fr: Ils ne détruiront pas ma famille.

translation.en: If you kill her, you kill me.
translation.fr: En la tuant, vous me tuez !

translation.en: Whoever a wolf imprints on can't be harmed.

translation.fr: C'est leur loi la plus absolue.

translation.en: - Maybe l was too late. - No, Edward.
Which is spelt with an "S," Sweet Bianca.
translation.fr: Qui s'écrit avec un "s"... chère Bianca.

translation.en: He's added a new member to his coven.
translation.fr: Il a ajouté un nouveau membre à son assemblée.

translation.en: At least our dispute with the Cullens is over.
translation.fr: Au moins, notre différend avec les Cullen est terminé.

translation.en: Our dispute goes far beyond the fate of a mere human.
translation.fr: Notre différend dépasse le sort... d'une simple humaine.

translation.en: Why, brother, l thought you understood.
translation.fr: Mon frère, je pensais que tu avais compris.
Ils ont une chose que je convoite.
